long_description: If you're a progressing all-mountain rider looking for a board that offers a forgiving flex, choose the lightweight K2 Bright Lite women's snowboard. Flat profile features a rockered tip and tail, offering you amazing contact with the snow when carving, and reliable float when charging through powder. Hyper Progressive sidecut mellows out the transitions, leaving you with a predictable, all-around board; you can make ultrafine adjustments at any speed and in all conditions. Hybritech construction minimizes the overall amount of materials used to unleash lightweight precision, powerful response and buttery-smooth performance. W2 rhythm core combines three types of wood to optimize strength, reduce weight and enhance dampening. Fiberglass laminated in directional layers adds torsional stiffness, improving edge hold and increasing stability during off-axis landings. Extruded base is easy to care for, and stands up to wear and tear. .
short_description: If you're a progressing all-mountain rider looking for a board that offers a forgiving flex, choose the lightweight K2 Bright Lite women's snowboard.
